name: getData
shortDescription: Retrieves previously stored data from Homegear's key-value database
description: This method returns data that was previously stored in Homegear's key-value database with setData.

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: The name of the component to get values for as used in setData.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key as defined in setData. If ommited all values for the component are returned.

returnValue: When key is specified the method returns the stored element. When only component is specified and key ommited the method returns a struct with the key-value pairs.
